original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, posts as p, users as u WHERE c.UserId = u.Id AND u.Id = p.OwnerUserId AND c.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-08-05 00:36:02' AS TIMESTAMP) AND c.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-08 16:50:49' AS TIMESTAMP) AND p.ViewCount>=0 AND p.ViewCount<=2897 AND p.CommentCount>=0 AND p.CommentCount<=16 AND p.FavoriteCount>=0 AND p.FavoriteCount<=10
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments WHERE CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-08-05 00:36:02' AND CAST(comments.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-08 16:50:49'

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM posts AS posts WHERE CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.ViewCount AS INTEGER) <= 2897 AND (CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.CommentCount AS INTEGER) <= 16) AND (CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(posts.FavoriteCount AS INTEGER) <= 10)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E2.OwnerUserId=E3.Id)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E2E3.OwnerUserId)
